channel.title: [PI] Server crashes when trying to add Jad
channel.description:
Hello,
I tried moving Jad to another position since my fight caves are disabled. I made a portal at my home and whenever u enter the portal, u get teleported to the jad area (not fight caves). The problem is, whenever i run the server and log in with any character and go to jad, the server crashes. It compiled fine, but lets say the game crashed with "Player X". Whenever u try to log in with "Player X" the game crashes instantly for that character, since he has been at jad. New characters can play find until they go to jad, if you know what I mean..
I've put this in spawn-config:
spawn = 2745 #### ### 0 0 20 100 50 TzTok-Jad (Hid the coords so no-one can come up with my idea.)
This is the error (in the server cmd):
[11-2-12 3:11]: Launching Project Insanity... [11-2-12 3:11]: Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:43594 [11-2-12 3:11]: sanity: character file not found. [11-2-12 3:11]: [REGISTERED]: sanity [11-2-12 3:11]: java.lang.NullPointerException [11-2-12 3:11]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.loadSpell(NPCHandler.jav a:1719) [11-2-12 3:11]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.attackPlayer(NPCHandler. java:1862) [11-2-12 3:11]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java: 933) [11-2-12 3:11]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:152) [11-2-12 3:11]: A fatal exception has been thrown! [11-2-12 3:11]: Saved game for sanity.
that character name was just for testing btw.
I hope anyone can help me with this.
Regards, Derpington

item.title: [PI] Server crashes when trying to add Jad
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[11-2-12 3:11]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.loadSpell(NPCHandler.jav a:1719) [11-2-12 3:11]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.attackPlayer(NPCHandler. java:1862) [11-2-12 3:11]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java: 993)

i think its something with the “abilitys” assigned to the Jad NPC.
check the NPCHandler.java and search for lines 1719, 1862 and 993

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Server crashes when trying to add Jad

item.title: [PI] Server crashes when trying to add Jad
item.dc:creator: @C_Imbued C++ Imbued
item.description:
@C_Imbued wrote:

[11-2-12 3:11]: java.lang.NullPointerException [11-2-12 3:11]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.loadSpell(NPCHandler.jav a:1719) [11-2-12 3:11]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.attackPlayer(NPCHandler. java:1862) [11-2-12 3:11]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java: 933) [11-2-12 3:11]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:152) [11-2-12 3:11]: A fatal exception has been thrown! [11-2-12 3:11]: Saved game for sanity.

It’s not because of you adding him to spawn-config it’s because there’s something wrong with loadSpells @ Npchanlder. @ Line: 1719.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Server crashes when trying to add Jad

item.title: [PI] Server crashes when trying to add Jad
item.dc:creator: @New_Legacy New Legacy
item.description:
@New_Legacy wrote:

Are the spaces between the line or tabs? There needs to be tabss.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Server crashes when trying to add Jad
item.dc:creator: @Derpington Derpington
item.description:
@Derpington wrote:

Hello,

I tried moving Jad to another position since my fight caves are disabled. I made a portal at my home and whenever u enter the portal, u get teleported to the jad area (not fight caves).
The problem is, whenever i run the server and log in with any character and go to jad, the server crashes. It compiled fine, but lets say the game crashed with “Player X”. Whenever u try to log in with “Player X” the game crashes instantly for that character, since he has been at jad. New characters can play find until they go to jad, if you know what I mean…

I’ve put this in spawn-config:

spawn = 2745 #### ### 0 0 20 100 50 TzTok-Jad (Hid the coords so no-one can come up with my idea.)

This is the error (in the server cmd):

[11-2-12 3:11]: Launching Project Insanity…
[11-2-12 3:11]: Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:43594
[11-2-12 3:11]: sanity: character file not found.
[11-2-12 3:11]: [REGISTERED]: sanity
[11-2-12 3:11]: java.lang.NullPointerException
[11-2-12 3:11]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.loadSpell(NPCHandler.jav
a:1719)
[11-2-12 3:11]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.attackPlayer(NPCHandler.
java:1862)
[11-2-12 3:11]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java:
933)
[11-2-12 3:11]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:152)

[11-2-12 3:11]: Saved game for sanity.

that character name was just for testing btw.

I hope anyone can help me with this.

Regards,
Derpington
